magic_tricks.title: The Sticky Pencil
magic_tricks.subtitle: Learn the Magnetic Pencil Trick: A Simple Illusion to Wow Your Friends
magic_tricks.description: A beginner-friendly sleight-of-hand trick that makes a pencil appear to stick to your wrist.
items_needed: A watch with a snug strap
steps: Secretly secure a second pencil behind the watch strap
Hold a visible pencil in line with the hidden one
Pretend the pencil is sticking magnetically to your wrist
Reveal with dramatic flair
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Relies on hidden pencil placement and audience distraction.

magic_tricks.title: The Disappearing Coin
magic_tricks.description: Make a coin vanish using simple sticky tape.
steps: Stick the coin to the back of your hand with tape
Pretend to grab it with your other hand
Lower your taped hand casually
For reappearing: pretend to catch it and reveal on hand
magic_tricks.how_it_works: The coin remains hidden on the back of your hand throughout.

magic_tricks.title: Spinning Straw Illusion
magic_tricks.description: Make a straw spin using static electricity.
steps: Rub straw to build static electricity
Balance it on bottle opening
Wave hands nearby to make it spin
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Static electricity causes the straw to rotate.

magic_tricks.title: The Appearing Coin
magic_tricks.description: Make a coin magically appear in someone's hands.
steps: Secretly balance coin on your head
Have spectator cup their hands
Tilt head to drop coin into their hands
Act surprised at the 'magic'
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Coin is secretly dropped from hidden position.

magic_tricks.title: The Sliced Banana Magic Trick
magic_tricks.description: A banana that appears pre-sliced inside its peel.
steps: Before performing, use needle to slice banana inside peel
When ready, peel banana to reveal slices
Act surprised at the 'magic'
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Banana is pre-cut while peel remains intact.

magic_tricks.title: Find Any Card (Marked Deck)
magic_tricks.description: Locate a spectator's chosen card using a simple marking system.
steps: Mark one card subtly with pencil dot
Place marked card at bottom
Have spectator choose and return card
Cut deck to place their card next to marked one
Find marked card to locate theirs
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Uses a key card system to track selection.

magic_tricks.title: Find Any Card (One-Way Deck)
magic_tricks.description: Locate a card using a one-way design principle.
steps: Ensure all cards face same direction initially
Have spectator select card
Secretly rotate entire deck while they look at card
Have them return card (now reversed)
Spread deck to find the differently-oriented card
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Uses the principle of one-way deck designs.

magic_tricks.title: The Rising Card
magic_tricks.description: Make a chosen card rise mysteriously from the deck.
steps: Control chosen card to top of deck
Hold deck facing audience in left hand
Use right pinky to push card up from behind
Make rising motion with index finger
Remove card when halfway out
magic_tricks.how_it_works: Uses finger pressure to make card appear to rise on its own.
